transcription: You  Marvin, can you put the groceries away? Okay, mommy. Very nice! Thank you. Marvin, why are you sucking your thumb? Keep it out. Fine.  Marvin, you're not sucking your thumb anymore. Marvin, what are you doing? Nothing. Are you going to my purse? No. Did you just take money from me? No. You're grounded.  No more Timmy's house.
